cab.content: Military Secret.996Lit i'"o party of2 oif iff I CoVow. Viceroy, Army Department ,14f/i JwZj/19J9. (Received 15th.)8198. 14th July. Malleson wires 12th July, repeating to Baku :-Two trains lull, of Bolshevik troops from direction of Askabad passed through Artik going east on afternoon of 11th July. These troops thought they had been ordered to Bokhara in view of trouble with Amir. We are aware, however, that Bokhara trouble has been composed, and it is almost certain destination of troops is Orenburg and other (group omitted) in neighbourhood of Kazalinsk, where military situation is very serious for Bolsheviks."
